text: Ithi, “Oh Bantu bencwadi! Sondelani ezwini elifanayo phakathi kwethu nani ukuthi angeke sibe nento enokukhonzwa ngaphandle kukaMvelinqangi nokuthi angeke senze abahlanganyele kanye naye nokuthi abanye bethu angeke bathathe abanye njengamakhosi esikhundleni sikaMvelinqangi” kepha uma befulathela ithi, “fakazani ukuthi singabazinikeleyo ngaphansi kwentando kaMvelinqangi”
